```{r build-tables, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)
library(gt)
library(here)
library(magrittr) 


df <- readr::read_csv(here("data", "f75_interim.csv")) %>%
  mutate(arm = factor(arm))

#descriptive table
gtsummary_table <- df %>%
  select(weight1, weight2, muac1, muac2) %>%
  tbl_summary(
    statistic = all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
    digits = everything() ~ 2
  )

#bivariate table 
gtsummary_bivariate <- df %>%
  select(arm, weight1, weight2, muac1, muac2) %>%
  tbl_summary(
    by = arm,
    statistic = all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})"
  ) %>%
  add_p()
```

### Table 1: 
```{r table1, echo=FALSE}
gtsummary_table %>%
  as_gt()
```
**Table 1. Overall Summary of Measurements (N = 513).**


### Table 2: 
```{r table2, echo=FALSE}
gtsummary_bivariate %>%
  as_gt()
```
**Table 2. Comparison of Measurements Between Treatment Arms.**
